title: Ep 90: Erika Wins the Game
description:
In This Episode: We play a fun game of search terms to try to find unique stories from out listeners! We talk about a person adding some spice to their food, a kid who doesn't want to pay rent, a racist grandparent, a guy who had an interesting night out in Chicago, a dirty carpet cleaners bathroom mistakes, . We also have a CJ to remind you of some of your real world problems :) 
Get Judgies Merch
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like) P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350
Leave an Apple Review
Follow us on Twitter
Follow us on Instagram
Intro Music by: Iván

3:21 Love Is Blind Talk
4:53 New Format Rulez
7:21 Erika First Guess
8:50 AITA Adding Spice to My Food
13:43 Christian First Guess
16:23 AITA Not Paying Rent
24:52 Erika Second Guess
26:23 AITA Ignoring Grandpa
32:53 BREAK
33:25 CJ: Real Life Problems
41:13 Christian Second Guess
43:54 Chicago mishaps
54:17 Erika Third Guess
55:53 Carpet Cleaners
1:03:44 Christian Third Guess
1:04:54 Dangerous Neighbor
1:11:03 Outro
